IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDING EDUCATIONAL ASSISTANCE TO STUDENTS OF DANVILLE COMMUNITY COLLEGE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE DCC EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION WAS ESTABLISHED TO ENHANCE THE ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE OF DANVILLE COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND TO IMPROVE THE COLLEGE'S ABILITY TO SERVE THE CITIZENS OF OUR AREA IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE COLLEGE'S MISSION. OBJECTIVES OF THE FOUNDATION INCLUDE: AWARDING STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS, PROVIDING PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT FOR FACULTY AND STAFF, ENSURING THAT INSTRUCTIONAL EQUIPMENT KEEPS PACE WITH TECHNOLOGICAL CHANGES, STRENGTHENING THE ACADEMIC PROGRAMS, AND ENCOURAGING CULTURAL ACTIVITIES.
IRS990.Desc: DANVILLE COMMUNITY COLLEGE EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION PROVIDES SCHOLARSHIP FUNDING TO DCC STUDENTS AND GRADUATION SCHOLARSHIPS FOR DCC STUDENTS WHO ATTEND FOUR-YEAR INSTITUTIONS UPON THEIR GRADUATION FROM DCC.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE DCC EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION IS ALSO RESPONSIBLE FOR THE PROMOTION OF FACULTY AND STAFF PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT THROUGH FUNDING OPPORTUNITIES AND HAS PROVIDED FUNDING TO STRENGTHEN ACADEMIC PROGRAMS AND ENCOURAGE CULTURAL ACTIVITIES. FUNDING PROVIDED BY THE FOUNDATION HAS BEEN VITAL IN THE CONSTRUCTION OF NEW FACILITIES AND THE PURCHASE OF NEW STATE-OF-THE-ART EQUIPMENT TO KEEP PACE WITH TECHNOLOGICAL CHANGES.

OtherAssetsOrgGrp.Desc: FUNDS HELD IN TRUST BY OTHERS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF APPROXIMATELY 100 INDIVIDUAL FUNDS ESTABLISHED PRIMARILY FOR SCHOLARSHIPS INCLUDING BOTH DONOR-RESTRICTED ENDOWMENT FUNDS AND FUNDS DESIGNATED BY THE FOUNDATION'S BOARD OF DIRECTORS TO FUNCTION AS ENDOWMENTS.

MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED THE EFFECT OF THE GUIDANCE PROVIDED IN THE FINANCIAL ACCOUNTING STANDARDS BOARD ("FASB") ACCOUNTING STANDARDS CODIFICATION ("ASC") ON ACCOUNTING FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES. MANAGEMENT BELIEVES THAT THE FOUNDATION CONTINUES TO SATISFY THE REQUIREMENTS OF A TAX-EXEMPT ORGANIZATION AT JUNE 30, 2021 AND 2020. MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED ALL TAX POSITIONS THAT COULD HAVE A SIGNIFICANT EFFECT ON THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND DETERMINED THAT THE FOUNDATION HAD NO UNCERTAIN INCOME TAX POSITIONS AT JUNE 30, 2021 AND 2020.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO COMMUNITY COLLEGE STUDENTS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COLLEGE REQUESTS A TRANSFER FROM THE FOUNDATION AND PROVIDES SUFFICIENT DOCUMENTATION TO SUPPORT THE REQUEST IN THE CASE OF SPECIAL PROJECTS. THE FOUNDATION REVIEWS THE REQUEST AND MAKES THE APPROPRIATE EXPENDITURE OF FUNDS. SCHOLARSHIPS ARE AWARDED TO STUDENTS OF THE COLLEGE.
THE FOUNDATION WAS ESTABLISHED TO ENHANCE THE ACADEMIC EXCELLENCE OF DANVILLE COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND IMPROVE THE COLLEGE'S ABILITY TO SERVE ITS STUDENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE RETURN IS DETAIL REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE WHO IS AUTHORIZED BY THE FOUNDATION BOARD TO PERFORM SUCH A REVIEW AND APPROVAL. SHANNON HAIR, VICE PRESIDENT OF INSTITUTIONAL ADVANCEMENT AND DEVELOPMENT, WILL SIGN THE RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EACH BOARD MEMBER IS REQUESTED TO PROVIDE ANNUALLY IN WRITING TO THE DCCEF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR A LIST OF OFFICES AND DIRECTORSHIPS HE OR SHE HOLDS IN CHARITABLE AND BUSINESS ORGANIZATIONS AND TO IDENTIFY HIS OR HER PLACE OF EMPLOYMENT OR PRINCIPAL BUSINESS ACTIVITY. IN THE EVENT THE DCCEF IS CONSIDERING A CONTRIBUTION TO, OR THE PROCUREMENT OF SERVICES FROM, AN ENTITY IN WHICH THE BOARD MEMBER SHALL SO INFORM THE BOARD AND REFRAIN FROM VOTING ON THE MATTER. AT THE DISCRETION OF THE CHAIRMAN, THE BOARD MEMBER MY BE EXCUSED FROM BOARD DISCUSSION ON THIS MATTER. THIS PROCEDURE SHALL ALSO BE APPLICABLE TO COMMITTEES OF THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE SECRETARY HAS POSSESSION OF THE DOCUMENTS AND WILL PROVIDE COPIES OF THE DOCUMENTS IF REQUESTS ARE MADE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PAGES 9 AND 10, PARTS VII AND IX:
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: DANVILLE COMMUNITY COLLEGE, A RELATED ORGANIZATION, PROVIDES COMPENSATION TO OFFICERS AND KEY EMPLOYEES FOR SERVICES PERFORMED FOR THE FOUNDATION AS PROVIDED ON FORM 990, PART VII. THIS IS REPORTED AS RELATED ORGANIZATION CONTRIBUTIONS ON PART VIII, LINE 1D OF FORM 990, AND SALARIES PAID OUT ON LINE 5, PART IX OF FORM 990. COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF THE RELATED ORGANIZATION DANVILLE COMMUNITY COLLEGE AND BASED ON MARKET VALUES OF COMPARABLE ORGANIZATIONS.
NO CHANGES TO THE PROCESS FROM THE PRIOR YEAR.
